segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice that the water is overflowing, pouring out of the basin onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing larger, but she doesn’t seem to care at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is solely on that plate, as if the world around her has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m shocked that she hasn’t felt the water soaking her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the chaos is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so serene and well-kept, it's almost mocking the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
